title: A Ranger's Versatility (1U113)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert a ranger at a river or forest to exhaust a minion.
Lore:	”'If you bring a Ranger with you, it is well to pay attention to him, especially if the Ranger is Aragorn.'”
Rarity:	U
Notes:	Game text is an erratum.
